caller_intent: The caller wanted to inquire about the status of a refund check for a policy under their account (number 100717077) with Federal Haco Martinez.
resolution_steps: Agent JC Dominguez verified the caller's account number and agency code (15039400).
JC confirmed the refund check was in processing and typically takes 30 days but could be expedited.
JC checked the status and informed the caller the check would be sent on Monday.
knowledge_required: Refund processing timelines for Auto Owners Insurance
Account verification procedures for billing inquiries
Understanding of agency codes and policyholder information
summary: An Alliance Insurance agent assisted a caller inquiring about a refund check for a Federal Haco Martinez policy. After verifying account details, the agent confirmed the check would be sent on Monday. The call resolved the customer's query about refund timing.
